presentation.label: TCP CSV
presentation.description:
TCPCSV Presentation is a simple TCPS client which transmits CSV channel data. Each row of the CSV data is given as:
channel_name,timestamp,value,unit
Where timestamp is adjusted to GMT and given in the format:
YYYY-mm-dd HH:MM:SS

setting.label: Server
setting.tooltip: IP address or hostname to connect to.

setting.label: Port
setting.tooltip: TCP port number to connect to.

setting.label: Interval
setting.tooltip: How often (in seconds) to emit CSV data.

setting.label: Channels
setting.tooltip: List of channels to include in the data set. If this setting is not given, all channels will be included.

template.label: Channel
template.tooltip: Name of the channel to include in the data set.
